message: I propose dividing the $100 with an 80/20 split in favor of Alice, considering the decreasing value of money in subsequent rounds.
I propose a 55/45 split in my favor. While I recognize the declining value of money, I believe this offer is fair considering the potential for even greater losses in subsequent rounds.
Considering the decreasing value of money, I propose a 70/30 split in favor of Alice. This maintains a reasonable advantage while acknowledging the risk of further inflation in future rounds.

I'm proposing a 60/40 split in my favor. With each round, the value of money is decreasing faster for you than for me. This offer attempts to balance our respective losses and avoid further rounds of negotiation.
